channel.title: Mac Client
channel.description: Anyone know how to make a mac compatable run? using this: [code]@echo off Title Client cd ./Class/ "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 exit[/code] IF anyone can do it, that would be awesome. I don't have a mac so I have no clue how to do it. Thanks

item.title: Mac Client
item.dc:creator: @Wintercanon Wintercanon
item.description:
@Wintercanon wrote:

[quote=“Redemtion, post:10, topic:414508”][quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=516476.msg3751534#msg3751534 date=1316054307]
“I want a mac compatible client, but I don’t own a mac”

wut
[/quote]
Is it really that hard to find out? maybe other people play rsps but only have mac computers? :HURR:[/quote]Maybe the Runescape client is written in Java, making it multiplatform, meaning you don’t need a Mac client. :HURR:

Read full topic

This is h4x0r88’s mac client. Worth a try. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=401532.0

[quote=“zyle1992, post:9, topic:414508”]“I want a mac compatible client, but I don’t own a mac”

item.title: Mac Client
item.dc:creator: @TheCyberMan TheCyberMan
item.description:
@TheCyberMan wrote:

[quote=“Redemtion, post:1, topic:414508”]Anyone know how to make a mac compatable run?
using this:

@echo off Title Client cd ./Class/ "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 exit
IF anyone can do it, that would be awesome.
I don’t have a mac so I have no clue how to do it.
Thanks[/quote]

I’m a Mac user

try this:
cd (drag Class directory here)
java -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32

Read full topic

item.title: Mac Client
item.dc:creator: @Wintercanon Wintercanon
item.description:
@Wintercanon wrote:

You guys know Java is platform independant right? You don’t need a Mac client. Just use “java path/to/main/Class var1 var2” etc in the terminal.

Read full topic

item.title: Mac Client
item.dc:creator: @Redemtion Redemtion
item.description:
@Redemtion wrote:

Camballer:

Tbh, mac SUCKS for rsps.

I know but my friend has a mac, and wants to play my server too. If anyone could please help, that would be awesome.

[quote=“Fridder, post:2, topic:414508”][quote author=Redemtion link=topic=516476.msg3748817#msg3748817 date=1315875678]
Anyone know how to make a mac compatable run?
using this:

@echo off Title Client cd ./Class/ "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 exit
IF anyone can do it, that would be awesome.
I don’t have a mac so I have no clue how to do it.
Thanks
[/quote]

Hmmm…
Looks like you haven’t even attempted to create a mac compatible run.

Look up some tutorials.[/quote]
well no duh i haven’t tried, don’t even own a mac… and yah mac’s suck, and link me to a tut…
I have no clue were to start.

Read full topic
